::Lower;
::NFC;

\' → ʔ;
’ → ʔ;

a → æ;
å → ɑ;

b → b;
ch → t\u0361s;
{c} [eéií] → θ; # loanwords
c → k; # loanwords
d → d;
e → e;
f → f;
gu → ɡʷ;
g → ɡ;
h → h;
i → i;
j → x ; # loanwords
k → k;
l → l;
m → m;
ng → ŋ;
ñ → ɲ;
n → n;
o → o;
p → p;
{qu} [eéiíy] → k; # loanwords
q → k; # loanwords
rr → r;
r → ɾ;
s → s;
t → t;
u → u;
v → β; # loanwords
w → w; # loanwords
{x} h?[aáåeéiíoóuú$] → ks; # loanwords
{x} [^aáåeéiíoóuú$] → s; # loanwords
x → ks ; # loanwords

y → d\u0361z;

\- → \.; # hyphen is a syllable boundary, eg ‹sena-ta›

::Null;
bb → bː;
dd → dː;
ff → fː;
ɡɡ → ɡː;
hh → hː;
kk → kː;
ll → lː;
mm → mː;
nn → nː;
pp → pː;
rr → rː;
ss → sː;
tt → tː;

::NFC;
